923100.aiDescription: Winner of the Best Soundtrack award at the 2025 7 Wells Israeli Indie Game Awards in Beersheba, this Early Access title stands out for its exceptional audio design. Currently in active development, it offers players a chance to experience its award-winning soundscape while the game continues to evolve.

3019550.aiDescription: Winner of the Best Art Design award at the 2025 7 Wells Israeli Indie Game Awards in Beersheba, this title captivates with its striking visual style. Released in October 2025, it showcases the kind of artistic craftsmanship that earned it recognition among Israel's indie game community.

3541940.aiDescription: Born as an inventive student project where players physically struck a CRT monitor to influence gameplay, this title evolved from its tactile origins into a full Steam release. Nominated for Best Student Game at The 17th Unity Awards, it showcases a creative leap from experimental hardware interaction to polished digital experience.

3924170.aiDescription: The third creation from animator-turned-game-developer Alex Klexber, this upcoming title has already captured widespread attention, amassing millions of views on Instagram. With a playable demo available ahead of its March 2026 release, players can get an early taste of Klexber's distinctive artistic vision.

Klexber.aiDescription: This collection spotlights the work of Alex Klexber, an animator and indie game creator whose distinctive style spans multiple titles. From Don't Wake God to Wheelborn and the upcoming Eternal Afternoon, Klexber's games reflect a creative vision shaped by his animation background. His work has been featured in the Israeli indie games newsletter.

AwardWinners.aiDescription: This collection celebrates the winners of the 2025 7 Wells Israeli Indie Game Awards, held in Beersheba. Featuring Riddlewood Manor, Moduwar, and Heroes Against Time, these three titles represent the best of Israel's indie game scene as recognized by the 7 Wells community.
